title: This is about to A Pixel 3 XL Caught Fire  Plugged it in and it started smoking look like fire life
content:
This is about to A Pixel 3 XL Caught Fire 
Plugged it in and it started smoking look like fire life issue  , melted to chargers white using original charger Pixel phone become apparent that the few reports of a broken back panel on Google Pixel 3 devices weren’t isolated incidents. I believe Google Pixel 3 XL now’s the time to take action by Google .
Where can get I get £650 refund or New Pixel  model which is safe to use ?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
